item_prototypes.description: This entry-level potion offers a modest restoration of health, making it a valuable asset for those embarking on their initial quests. Its instability, however, limits its effectiveness, preventing further enhancements or extensions beyond its fundamental healing capabilities.
item_prototypes.name: Minor Health Potion

item_prototypes.description: Offering a minor replenishment of magical energy, it proves invaluable for early adventures in the arcane arts. However, its instability limits any attempts to enhance its effects, keeping its utility confined to fundamental mana restoration.
item_prototypes.name: Minor Mana Potion

item_prototypes.description: Blood of a cursed creature. Its unholy properties, when harnessed with care, infuse crafted items with a sinister vitality.
